text: Te sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpenti jotenti parappavādaṃ pana khuṃsenti vambhenti paribhavanti omakkhiṃ karonti
edit: Te sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpenti jotenti parappavādaṃ pana khuṃsenti vambhenti paribhavanti omakkhiṃ karonti

translations.transtext: They explain [and] elucidate only their own view, but scold, despise, abuse, [and] make inferior other view.
